snippet: Since her resignation from Congress, Gabrielle Giffords has not returned the money in her campaign account, leaving the door open for another Congressional run.
abstract: Former Rep Gabrielle Giffords, who resigned from Congress in Jan 2012, appears to be holding on to much of the nearly $1 million left in her campaign account, leaving the door open for another Congressional run; she is still going through rehabilitation from her shooting in Tuscon, but her supporters and advisers are not ruling out a House or Senate run.
lead_paragraph: Since her resignation from Congress, Gabrielle Giffords has not returned the money in her campaign account, leaving the door open for another Congressional run.

headline.seo: Campaign Fund Prompts Talk of Giffords Comeback
headline.main: Giffords Keeps Campaign Money, Prompting Talk of a Possible Comeback
headline.print_headline: Giffords Keeps Campaign Money, Prompting Talk of a Possible Comeback
